general.title: 1. General Provisions
general.text: This agreement governs the use of the MyCompany online store. By using the website, you agree to these terms.

account.title: 2. Registration and Account
account.text: To make purchases, registration may be required. You are responsible for the security of your account.

orders.title: 3. Order Processing
orders.text: An order is considered placed once confirmed. We reserve the right to cancel orders in case of pricing errors or stock issues.

payment.title: 4. Payment and Refunds
payment.text: Payment is made online. Refunds are possible according to our return policy.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.text: We are not responsible for any damages caused by improper use of products or technical failures of the website.

changes.title: 6. Changes to Terms
changes.text: We reserve the right to change the terms of the agreement. Updated terms take effect upon publication.

contact.title: 7. Contact Information
contact.text: For any questions regarding the use of the website, please contact us at support@mycompany.com.
